content: small spa basket filled with spa cloths lotions and body gels this small basket makes a lovely gift materials 100% cotton yarn worsted weight approx 300 yards crochet hook size n yarn needle plastic canvas one-inch wide ribbon approx 36 inches optional lightweight craft wire approx 36 inches optional gauge 6 dcs = 2 inches 3 row = 2 inches finished size 10 inches long 6 inches wide and 5 inches high abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet space = space note this basket is worked with two strands of yarn the base consists of two pieces crocheted together with plastic canvas in between for stability you may prefer to crochet over the wire while working the top edging round the basket may also be stiffened with a white glue/water solution or other commercial solution side panel make 2 with 2 strands of yarn and n hook chain 27 row 1 double_crochet in fourth chain from hook and in each chain across chain 3 turn 25 sts row 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 4 turn row 3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet * chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * across chain 3 turn row 4 double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space across chain 3 turn row 5 - 7 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn at end of row 7 fasten yarn end panel make 2 with 2 strands of yarn and n hook chain 19 row 1 double_crochet in fourth chain from hook and in each chain across chain 3 turn 17 sts row 2 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 4 turn row 3 skip first double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet * chain 1 skip next double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet repeat from * across chain 3 turn row 4 double_crochet in each double_crochet and chain-1 space across chain 3 turn row 5 double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn row 6 double_crochet in first 4 dcs chain 7 skip next 7 dcs double_crochet in remaining 5 dcs chain 3 turn row 7 double_crochet in each of first 4 dcs double_crochet in each of next 2 chs 2 double_crochet in each of next 3 chs double_crochet in each of next 2 chs double_crochet in remaining 5 dcs 20 sts fasten yarn assemble side and end panels holding one end panel and one side panel wrong sides together join two strands of yarn through both pieces with a slip_stitch single_crochet in same space and single_crochet along edge making sure to crochet through both pieces fasten yarn repeat process for all four corner joinings top edge trim attach 2 strands of yarn with slip_stitch to any double_crochet along top edge of basket single_crochet evenly around top of basket join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet if using craft wire for stability you will hold wire along the tops of dcs and crochet over the wire fasten yarn
